page.title: 13Bildeston School Children
page.content: I Pulled the curtains and had my break- fast. I had one egg and a piece of bread and butter. I dressed and cleaned my teeth with Blue Minty Gel.I went to the bus stop until the bus came and sat with William.After a few minuted we got off the bus and came straight into school and did ten spellings and the five times table. Raun counted the children and chose David to do the weather.I went into the hall with all the other children. We sang some songs and had a story about 'The Ugly Duckling'.We came back and did sums,then it was apple playtime. We played 'Star Wars' until the bell rang. Some of us did sums or our work folders I did my topic work until it was nearly dinner time when we had to wash for lunch and say our prayers. At dinner time we had chips and baked beans.For afters we had banana custard.
